text: Arau allahe tomalokara grhasamuhaka tomalokara babe abasasthala karaiche arau teraemi tomalokara babe pasura camaraarae ghara tambura byarastha karaiche, tomaloke se'itoka bhramanakalata arau arasthanakalata sahaja buli bhaba. Arau (byarastha karaiche) se'iborara pacama, noma arau culira paraa kichu kalara babe grha-samagrai arau byarahara-upakarana
